name: CreateAuthProvider
description:
Create a new authentication provider.

This tool is used to create a new authentication provider for the system, allowing integration with different authentication services.

parameters.name: auth_provider_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the auth provider to create, including OAuth2 configurations, external ID, and status.

external_id.description: The unique external ID for the auth provider

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the engine API.

external_id.description: The unique external ID for the auth provider
